  • ValueSet Omh Unit Value

    • Open mHealth to FHIR - Local Development build (v0.0.0). See the Directory of published versions

    • Narrative Content
    • JSON
    Defining URL:http://www.fhir.org/guides/omhtofhir/ValueSet/omh-unit-value
    Version:0.0.0
    Name:omh-unit-value
    Status:draft
    Title:OMH to FHIR Unit Value Value Set
    Definition:

    Implicit OMH units (not explicitly enumerated in the schemas) needed for OMH to FHIR mapping

    Publisher:Open mHealth
    Copyright:

    Open mHealth copyright 2015, a project of the Tides Center. All Rights Reserved.

    Source Resource:JSON

    This value set is not used here; it may be used elsewhere (e.g. specifications and/or implementations that use this content)

    Logical Definition (CLD)

    • Include these codes as defined in http://unitsofmeasure.org
      CodeDisplay
      {steps}steps
      mm[Hg]mmHg
      mg/dLmg/dL
      mmol/Lmmol/L
      kg/m2kg/m^2
      kCalkcal
      /minbeats/min
      /minbreaths/min
      %%

    Expansion

    No Expansion for this valueset (not supported by Publication Tooling)

    Open mHealth openmhealth.mfhir#0.0.0 based on FHIR 4.0.1 created 2020-07-14.
